mapper.select: select level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from toon_category start with cateCodeRef is null connect by prior cateCode = cateCodeRef
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_toon (toonNum, toonName,toonGenre, cateCode, toonDes) values (tbl_toon_seq.nextval, #{toonName}, #{toonGenre}, #{cateCode}, #{toonDes})
mapper.select: SELECT toonNum, toonName, toonGenre,cateCode ,toonFin,toonCash, toonView,toonGood, toonImg, toonDes, toonDate from tbl_toon

select t.toonNum, t.toonName, t.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, toonGenre, toonDes, toonGood, toonView, toonFin, toonDate from tbl_toon t inner join toon_category c on t.cateCode = c.cateCode where t.toonNum = #{toonNum}
mapper.update: update tbl_toon set toonName = #{toonName}, cateCode = #{cateCode}, toonGenre = #{toonGenre}, toonDes = #{toonDes} where toonNum = ${toonNum}
